item.title: [voc] Glass-Cast Heart
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever one or more Vampires you control attack, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

{B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 1/1 white and black Vampire creature token with lifelink.

{B}{B, {T}, Sacrifice Glass-Cast Heart and thirteen Blood tokens: Each opponent loses 13 life and you gain 13 life.

item.title: [voc] Ghostly Prison
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

item.title: [voc] Ghostly Pilferer
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Rogue

Whenever Ghostly Pilferer becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

Whenever an opponent casts a spell from anywhere other than their hand, draw a card.

Discard a card: Ghostly Pilferer can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [voc] Geist of Saint Traft
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Cleric

Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Whenever Geist of Saint Traft attacks, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

item.title: [voc] Haunted Library
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [voc] Hanged Executioner
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

When Hanged Executioner enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

{3}{W}, Exile Hanged Executioner: Exile target creature.

item.title: [voc] Hallowed Spiritkeeper
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

Vigilance

When Hallowed Spiritkeeper dies, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [voc] Glass-Cast Heart
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever one or more Vampires you control attack, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

{B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 1/1 white and black Vampire creature token with lifelink.

{B}{B, {T}, Sacrifice Glass-Cast Heart and thirteen Blood tokens: Each opponent loses 13 life and you gain 13 life.

item.title: [voc] Haunted Library
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [voc] Haunting Imitation
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each creature card revealed this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's 1/1, it's a Spirit in addition to its other types, and it has flying. If no creature cards were revealed this way, return Haunting Imitation to its owner's hand.

item.title: [voc] Imposing Grandeur
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player may discard their hand and draw cards equal to the greatest mana value of a commander they own on the battlefield or in the command zone.

item.title: [voc] Haunting Imitation
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each creature card revealed this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's 1/1, it's a Spirit in addition to its other types, and it has flying. If no creature cards were revealed this way, return Haunting Imitation to its owner's hand.

item.title: [voc] Imposing Grandeur
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player may discard their hand and draw cards equal to the greatest mana value of a commander they own on the battlefield or in the command zone.

item.title: [voc] Kamber, the Plunderer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Rogue

Partner with Laurine, the Diversion (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Laurine into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)

Lifelink

Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you gain 1 life and create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "1, Tap, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [voc] Indulgent Aristocrat
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Noble

Lifelink

{2}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

item.title: [voc] Imprisoned in the Moon
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature, land, or planeswalker

Enchanted permanent is a colorless land with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other card types and abilities.

item.title: [voc] Kami of the Crescent Moon
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit

At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.

item.title: [voc] Kamber, the Plunderer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Rogue

Partner with Laurine, the Diversion (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Laurine into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)

Lifelink

Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you gain 1 life and create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "1, Tap, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [voc] Laurine, the Diversion
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Rogue

Partner with Kamber, the Plunderer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Kamber into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)

First strike

{2}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

item.title: [voc] Knight of the White Orchid
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

First strike

When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [voc] Kirtar's Wrath
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy all creatures, then create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

item.title: [voc] Karmic Guide
item.description:
Creature — Angel Spirit

Flying, protection from black

Echo {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

When Karmic Guide enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [voc] Malakir Bloodwitch
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Shaman

Flying, protection from white

When Malakir Bloodwitch enters the battlefield, each opponent loses life equal to the number of Vampires you control. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

item.title: [voc] Laurine, the Diversion
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Rogue

Partner with Kamber, the Plunderer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Kamber into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)

First strike

{2}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

item.title: [voc] Markov Enforcer
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Soldier

Whenever Markov Enforcer or another Vampire enters the battlefield under your control, Markov Enforcer fights up to one target creature an opponent controls.

Whenever a creature dealt damage by Markov Enforcer this turn dies, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [voc] Markov Enforcer
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Soldier

Whenever Markov Enforcer or another Vampire enters the battlefield under your control, Markov Enforcer fights up to one target creature an opponent controls.

Whenever a creature dealt damage by Markov Enforcer this turn dies, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [voc] Marble Diamond
item.description:
Artifact

Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W}.

item.title: [voc] Midnight Arsonist
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

When Midnight Arsonist enters the battlefield, destroy up to X target artifacts without mana abilities, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

item.title: [voc] Mentor of the Meek
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [voc] Mirror Entity
item.description:
Creature — Shapeshifter

Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

{X}: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X and gain all creature types.

item.title: [voc] Midnight Clock
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {U}.

{2}{U}: Put an hour counter on Midnight Clock.

At the beginning of each upkeep, put an hour counter on Midnight Clock.

When the twelfth hour counter is put on Midnight Clock, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards. Exile Midnight Clock.

item.title: [voc] Midnight Arsonist
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

When Midnight Arsonist enters the battlefield, destroy up to X target artifacts without mana abilities, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

item.title: [voc] Myriad Landscape
item.description:
Land

Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [voc] Moorland Haunt
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{W}{U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [voc] Molten Echoes
item.description:
Enchantment

As Molten Echoes enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Whenever a nontoken creature of the chosen type enters the battlefield under your control, create a token that's a copy of that creature. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [voc] Mob Rule
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Gain control of all creatures with power 4 or greater until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

• Gain control of all creatures with power 3 or less until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

item.title: [voc] Night's Whisper
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

item.title: [voc] Necropolis Regent
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Flying

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put that many +1/+1 counters on it.

item.title: [voc] Nebelgast Herald
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Flying

Whenever Nebelgast Herald or another Spirit enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

item.title: [voc] Occult Epiphany
item.description:
Instant

Draw X cards, then discard X cards. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card type among cards discarded this way.

item.title: [voc] Nirkana Revenant
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Shade

Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional {B}.

{B}: Nirkana Revenant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [voc] Occult Epiphany
item.description:
Instant

Draw X cards, then discard X cards. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card type among cards discarded this way.

item.title: [voc] Path of Ancestry
item.description:
Land

Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [voc] Oyobi, Who Split the Heavens
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit

Flying

Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, create a 3/3 white Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [voc] Olivia's Wrath
item.description:
Sorcery

Each non-Vampire creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

item.title: [voc] Prairie Stream
item.description:
Land — Plains Island

({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)

Prairie Stream enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

item.title: [voc] Port Town
item.description:
Land

As Port Town enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Plains or Island card from your hand. If you don't, Port Town enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

item.title: [voc] Patron of the Vein
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Shaman

Flying

When Patron of the Vein enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.

Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, exile it and put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

item.title: [voc] Predators' Hour
item.description:
21

Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library face down. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell."

item.title: [voc] Predators' Hour
item.description:
21

Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library face down. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell."
